name: Legion of Super Heroes: Element Lad Online Trivia | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Element Lad's real name?
questions.explanation:
Jan Arrah.

	Jan Arrah, aka Element Lad, was introduced in 'Adventure Comics' #307 (1963).

questions.text: When Element Lad first auditioned and joined the Legion, he went by a different name.  What was it?
questions.explanation:
Mystery Lad.

	Jan was admitted without any Legionnaires other than Saturn Girl knowing what his actual power was.  She vouched for his admittance.

questions.text: What is Element Lad's home planet?
questions.explanation:
Trom.

	Trom is a highly radioactive planet where a very small humanoid population existed in one singular valley of land.  All inhabitants eventually developed the ability to transmute elements.

questions.text: What is the name of the space pirate and villain that committed genocide on Element Lad's home planet?
questions.explanation:
Roxxas.

	When Kivun Roxxas discovered what powers the people of Trom possessed, and they refused to do his bidding, he murdered them all.  He didn't know that Element Lad had secretly been able to escape.  Jan originally called himself Mystery Lad so that Roxxas would not know someone from Trom was still alive.

questions.text: When Element Lad next met the villain that killed his entire world, he attempted to execute him with a death-ray gun.  Element Lad pulled the trigger.  What Legionnaire prevented Element Lad from becoming an actual killer?
questions.explanation:
Chemical King.

	Chemical King used his power to deteriorate the gun's battery, thus weakening it's output.  Element Lad ended up shooting nothing more than a beam of light at Roxxas.  Chemical King reasoned that Element Lad would come to his senses after pulling the trigger of vengeance.  (Superboy #211 - 1975).

questions.text: After many years of being an almost monkish bachelor, Element Lad slowly entered into what would become a long term romantic relationship.  This relationship was with whom?
questions.explanation:
Shvaughn Erin.

	Shvaughn Erin was a member of the Science Police, Metropolis Division who had been the Legion Liaison officer for many years.

questions.text: In the "Five Year Later" continuity, it is revealed that Element Lad and his long time girlfriend are no longer a couple.  When he next sees her, what does he discover?
questions.correct: She is actually a transgendered woman
options: She is another escapee from his home planet
She has undergone a radiation process to obtain super powers
She is a plant in the Science Police put their by the Dominators.
questions.explanation:
She is actually a transgendered woman.

	Jan finds out that Shvaughn was really born Sean.  As a transgendered woman, she took "profem", a medicine to give her the body she identified as.  Sadly, we learn that Element Lad, coming from a very spiritually based world, would never have cared what specific type body that her soul was housed in.

questions.text: In the "Five Year Later" continuity the Legion meets a group of younger Legionnaires believed to be clones (Batch SW6).  What code name does the Batch SW6 Element Lad go by?
questions.explanation:
Alchemist.

	Eventually the existing Element Lad and Alchemist will join together as the existing universe is wiped from existence, and the continuity known as the Post Zero Hour Reboot will replace it.

questions.text: Sadly, in the Reboot continuity, ten legionnaires become a 'Legion Lost' (2000-2001) in both space and time.  During this period, Jan goes quite mad.  What name does he become known by?
questions.explanation:
Progenitor.

	After billions of years of being alone, a very insane Element Lad, as Progenitor, believes himself to be a god.  His mission to rewrite the universe with perfection and no variants of any kind.  As Progenitor, he kills fellow Legionnaire, Monstress.

questions.text: In 'Final Crisis: Legion of Three Worlds', the "threeboot" version of Element Lad is killed by whom?
questions.explanation:
Superboy Prime.

	Superboy Prime hurled a chunk of kryptonite that Element Lad had created, through his chest, killing him instantly.
